perturbation.original_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the undersigned hereby confirm the agreement by and among them to the joint filing on behalf of them of the Statement on Schedule 13D and any and all further amendments thereto, with respect to the securities of the above referenced issuer, and that this Agreement be included as an Exhibit to such filing.
perturbation.changed_text: In accordance with Rule 13d-1(k) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, the signatories hereby confirm the understanding by and among them regarding the combined submission on their behalf of the Report on Form 13D and any subsequent modifications, concerning the instruments of the aforementioned institution, and that this Document shall be attached as an Appendix to such filing.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'undersigned' is replaced by 'signatories', 'agreement' by 'understanding', 'joint filing' by 'combined submission', 'Statement on Schedule 13D' by 'Report on Form 13D', 'amendments' by 'modifications', 'securities' by 'instruments', 'issuer' by 'institution', 'Agreement' by 'Document' and 'Exhibit' by 'Appendix'. The original paragraph establishes a formal agreement while the modified version refers to an informal 'understanding'. This weakens the legal enforceability of the filing requirement.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: This Document can be signed in several duplicates where each one will be treated as a copy, and all of them together are viewed as a complete set of copies.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Agreement' is replaced by 'Document', 'executed' is replaced by 'signed', 'counterparts' is replaced by 'duplicates', 'original' is replaced by 'copy', and 'one and the same Agreement' is replaced by 'a complete set of copies'. The original text specifies that each counterpart is an original, carrying full legal weight. The modified version states that each duplicate is treated as a copy and is viewed as a complete set of copies, potentially weakening the legal weight of the signed document and leading to uncertainty about which version is the definitive one.

perturbation.original_text: ATHENE ANNUITY AND LIFE COMPANY By: Apollo Insurance Solutions Group LP, its investment adviser By: AISG GP Ltd., its general partner By: /s/ Matthew S. O'Mara Matthew S. O'Mara Authorized Signatory
perturbation.changed_text: ATHENE ANNUITY AND LIFE FIRM Through: Apollo Insurance Solutions Group LP, its investment consultant Via: AISG GP Ltd., its main partner By: /s/ Matthew S. O'Mara Matthew S. O'Mara Official Representative
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'COMPANY' is replaced by 'FIRM', 'adviser' by 'consultant', 'general partner' by 'main partner', and 'Authorized Signatory' by 'Official Representative'. While seeming minor, changing 'Company' to 'Firm' could imply a different legal structure, and substituting 'adviser' with 'consultant' may alter the scope of responsibilities. 'Authorized Signatory' to 'Official Representative' introduces ambiguity regarding the level of authority.
